msbt.message: Just remember as we get this year started, folks will only remember what you did on the first day. And actually, they won't even remember that. So go forward confidently! No one will remember anything weird that you do. Unless it's REALLY weird.
So, what's the plan? Going out and celebrating the new year with everyone, or chilling at home? If only there were some way to do both at the same time
The new year just got cookin', and I'm already having great luck!Last year I woke up craving eggplant, which is neither here nor there

Are you the kind of person who sets a lot of goals for the new year?I used to do that, and then I realized that I wasn't living up to these made-up standards for myself. Now I just try to be true to , you know what I mean?
One time I paid to have my fortune readand the fortune-teller said that I'd never be a famous dancer. In your face, Carl the All-Knowing!<10_4 /> IN.<10_4 /> YOUR. <10_4 />FACE!
